com.agorapulse.permissions

Annotation Type GrantsPermission


  • @Around
 @Inherited
 @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
 @Type(value=GrantsPermissionInterceptor.class)
public @interface GrantsPermission
    You can use GrantsPermission annotation to bypass checks otherwise implied by RequiresPermission within a method body.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String[] value 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] target 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String[] value
        Returns:
        the list of the permission granted within the method body to the method's arguments

      • target

        public abstract String[] target
        Returns:
        the list of the names of the arguments to bypass the permissions checks
        Default:
        ""
